description: In the heart of the Mediterranean, a series of thefts have left the local art community in disarray. As whispers of a notorious art thief circulate, your mission is to unravel the tangled web of deceit and find the culprit before they vanish into the shadows. Each clue leads you deeper into a world where art and betrayal intertwine.
